interestingcomments.content: Nikon Z7 raw files are coming out greenish /!/ Hey everyone, I’m having this issue where the raw files have a greenish hue when imported to my computer. When it’s jpeg, the green hue is gone. I’ve compared it to old raw files and those aren’t affected. I’ve reset all the cameras settings and the problem isn’t rectified. What could I do next?

interestingcomments.content:
Is there any way to get WMU to download a full-resolution RAW file? /!/ So I have a Nikon D750 and really like the ability to download through WMU via wifi, but I can't find any way to make it download a full resolution RAW file. It seems to only download a JPG previews at 1080p..

Is this just a limitation of Nikon''s tech? If so, what is even the point of remote downloading?
